website_summaries.verdict: This fire grate is good for people wanting to upgrade their backyard fire ring for more height or for a cooking grate surface.
pros: Cooking grate comes in three sizes
Fits well with most fire rings
Will last several seasons in the weather
Can also be used to place wood on top and increase airflow for more efficient burn in your fire pit
cons: The slats on this grate work well for cookware but are likely too wide for cooking food directly on the grate

customer_reviews.title: If you can't take the heat...
customer_reviews.text: So although it seemed like a robust fire grate, it sagged from the heat after only three uses in my new fire pit. Two additional feet at the critical point would probably prevent this. (And maybe one in the middle.) So what's the point of having this?
customer_reviews.author: Roly1200

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grate for my cast-Iron pot/fire pit.
customer_reviews.text: The grate is absolutely perfect for my homemade fire pit. A 28” wide large cast-iron pot. A family heirloom. Over 200 years old. Cooked a lot of meals way back. Wanted to convert it to a unique fireplace without drilling holes and ruining the pot. The grate on its detachable feet is the perfect solution to allow air flow. Sturdy, strong and so far it is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Dunno

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy, time will tell
customer_reviews.text: At first glance it seems sturdy enough. A few other reviews said it started sagging after 3 fires, so I'll update this review in a week. I have a large outside fire pit and I'll put this to the test this week. I usually have an outside fire 3-5 times per week. Update 10-12: the middle is starting to sag. I usually do a lot fire cabin, so it's not just from weight. Still going strong though, another bar perpendicular to the other ones in the center would beef this up.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: 19" fits Solo perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but not great. Bought to put together top of a solo stove, and this one for perfectly. The more feet keep this of the lip. The one concern is that the coating on this basically melted and burned of on the first use, exposing the metal. Hoping that the metal doesn't corrode in the future. Will update review if I see the metal rusting.
customer_reviews.author: BourneUltimatum

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty w screw on legs
customer_reviews.text: Piece is exactly what it appears to be, very heavy bar stock grate, that will fit a whole variety of situations and uses ... example, this one with the legs it came with, is perfect for my round fire pit. but, the very next time I go on an outdoor picnic with friends, it will get a set of much longer legs, and become my outdoor campfire cooking platform. Because the legs unscrew, it's perfect to multiple uses like that.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Warren

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Good quality fire pit grade very sturdy does get a little bit of a been to it if you add very much weight on top when it’s hot but I did probably have 25 pounds of wood on it when it was red hot. I have bought a second one and I would recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Bill & Laura

customer_reviews.title: It fits great 👍 strudy would highly recommend one
customer_reviews.text: I love this grate saves the Bottom of my fire pit. I use it to burn wood & dura logs for pit sitting around listening to music and having a drink 😉. Supper easy to clean off just brush off & dump Ash out of pit!
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: This lifted the wood up off the bottom of our pit enough to get a good air flow for easier fire starting. Keeps the wood out of the ashes and feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: F.E. ArlissTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made grate, purchased in addition to the fire pit that we bought at the same time. The fire pit actually came with its own grate, but we wanted something that was heavy duty to last longer. This fit the bill perfectly. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dobiemom16

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed, used it in a fire pit and sagged completely to the bottom of the fire pit. Originally when purchased I though it was extremely heavy weight. Not the case
customer_reviews.author: Chester

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine
customer_reviews.text: I had to purchase 4 fire bricks as after each use had to turn it over as it warped badly.
customer_reviews.author: James stevens

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my fire pit.
customer_reviews.text: Durability 4 stars: one of the legs came off in transit on a camping trip. Leg was lost but after contacting the company they sent a replacement. A big thank you for that.
customer_reviews.author: G&P

customer_reviews.title: Well made grate
customer_reviews.text: Quality item. Well made & sturdy. Made to last. Perfect for our fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: hallie henrickson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This grate is great! We have a 28" round firepit, and upon research found that the ideal size for a grate would be 24". Ordered this and used it for the first time a couple of nights ago, and WOW! It's super sturdy and worked like a charm. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gabey

customer_reviews.title: The right ring for our ring.
customer_reviews.text: Ring was a perfect fit for our fire ring. Since it is elevated a few inches, it allows sit to get under the wood and keep the fire going without too much stirring.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet but legs don’t seem to be long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Gondara

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Improved the functionality of my fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C.

customer_reviews.title: Let the fire be warm!
customer_reviews.text: This grate fit our new fire pit perfectly and will hold our wood for our first fire. It just takes an accurate measure and it works!
customer_reviews.author: Boodinger

customer_reviews.title: Helps to keep the air flow under the wood.
customer_reviews.text: It helps keep the wood off the bottom of the pit.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Bartz

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.text: This grate was what helped us build better fires in our new firepit. The wood is raised high enough for air circulation and ashes to drop and burn off. I am very pleased that I purchased this grate. It fits perfectly in the firepit.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Davidson

customer_reviews.title: garbage grate
customer_reviews.text: It bent after the second use! it bent inward and down. I want a refund this is insane. I need to post a photo of it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to raise wood off bottom of our fire pit. Works great. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E Towson

customer_reviews.title: This is a replacement grate for my 36" fire pit ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement grate for my 36" fire pit that had a piece of junk in it so I was nervous. It worked out perfectly with my only change of of the standoff legs from 3 inches to 1.5 inches. The original grate was almost tin foil junk. This grate is military style and will outlast everything around it.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Nice fire.  Good Smores.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our new firepit. Only wish the legs were a bit longer. Sits a little too close to the ground
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Williams

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the one that came with cheap fire pit. This was an excellent replacement.
customer_reviews.author: James Skiles

customer_reviews.title: Loses shape and sags
customer_reviews.text: Completely deformed after a few uses. Complete junk for 60 bucks look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Good fire grate
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty grate as advertised. It fits my fire pit perfectly as a fire grate.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Super study
customer_reviews.text: Came quick! Super study. Fit right into the fire pit. Makes fire starting easier with newspaper under the grate, and kindling above.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a fire on it yet, but item is as advertised. Fit perfectly in bottom of my square for pit. Old grate was a 12" by 12" square. The feet on this grate are the same spacing plus it sits a little higher so should give good air flow. Material is much better too. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: davidmw

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome addition to my fire pit. Keeps the logs off the ground and good air flow underneath. Heavy duty metal. Seams like it is gonna last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mill Hunky Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dimensions. Needs no selling promotion as it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Little

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet but appears to be very well made. Ideal for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Damage
customer_reviews.text: The box can all hang up open in many spot also missing a leg I figured it out
customer_reviews.author: maria s.

customer_reviews.title: This product doesn't work it mailed it in fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Product melted in the fireplace and I'm trying to get a refund
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty is Right!
customer_reviews.text: This is the heaviest duty grate that I've ever seen, absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inferior fire grill
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product less than 6 months ago and it is already ruined. This product has warped and bent after 6 fires. Clearly an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Normal Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy grate and seems that it's going to last much longer than one or two seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Frosty

customer_reviews.title: Very solid and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Well made. It will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Height for air draft, for good fire,and coal buidup.
customer_reviews.text: It worked out just right , and functions perfectly. I recommend to anyone who has a fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and fits perfectly for my fire pit. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Magnan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice item....will use to load firewood on top of it in my firepit to improve airflow
customer_reviews.author: William F. Mangano Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy I am using it for bottom of my fire out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered in error!
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered in error. Thought it was a log rack to hold burning logs. It's a cooking gratevwhuch we did not need. Returned...but for someone who needs a cooking grate, it looked very nice.
customer_reviews.author: barb0710

customer_reviews.title: but glad I bought one
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, a little too pricey, but glad I bought one.
customer_reviews.author: SM

product_meta.title: onlyfire Round Fire Pit Grate with 4 Legs for Outdoor Campfire Grill Cooking, 24 Inch
feature_bullets: Ideal for most built in or stand-alone fire pits
Not recommended to place food directly on grate but perfect for pots and pans!
Sits 3 inches from ground allowing air to circulate
4 detachable legs improves airflow by raising firewood off the ground
Steel construction for stability and durability; With almost half inch thick bars to avoid damage; High temperature paint

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars124 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
